Welcome to my Homepage!

I am Sharbatanu Chatterjee, and I go by the name Sharbat. I am a postdoctoral researcher in neuroscience in Paris, employed by the CNRS, and working in the team of Dr. Tihana Jovanic at the Institut des Neurosciences Paris-Saclay.

Contact Me CV Publications Blog

What do I do?

I broadly work in the field of neuroscience - to try and figure out how brains lead to behaviour. Please check out my publications and (academic) blog articles to know more.

Read more

Where do I come from?

I was born in the banlieues of Calcutta, where I spent my childhood. I subsequently moved to Kanpur, Lausanne, London, before moving to Paris where I currently live.

What else do I do?

I am interested in languages, travel, history, political theory, science communication, & immigration. I blog on languages & linguistics, travel, & history.
